content:
Sure! Here is the information about the Roman festival of Saturnalia for a 2-year-old:

* Saturnalia was a big party for the Romans.
* They had a party to celebrate a special god named Saturn.
* Even the slaves got to take a break and play games.
* People gave each other presents, like toys and candy.
* Everyone ate yummy food and sang songs together.
* It was a happy time for everyone to have fun together.
* The Romans looked forward to Saturnalia every year.
